/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from under a concrete overpass, providing a unique viewpoint of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, contrasting with the lush greenery of the trees lining the street. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings and vehicles.
